title: Body of Lies: An Arabian Nights Retelling of Occult Fantasy and Forbidden Love
description: Embark on a mystical journey where Arabian Nights intertwine with Aladdin retellings and the occult in "Body of Lies," the captivating second installment of "The Rise of Jinn" series.Follow Alex and Claudia as they embark on a perilous quest to rescue Layla, Bride of the Red Genie. As they become entangled in Zoranth's enigma, their beliefs shift, leading them to embrace his cause and confront an insidious cult led by Cornelius.But be warned, for even in their ranks, secrets and lies abound. This thrilling narrative blends fantasy and the unknown, delving into friendship, alliances, and the eternal struggle between light and darkness. Venture with them through a treacherous path, unveiling unity, allure, and the unwavering human spirit.
author: Abby McCormick
